emailFormat: The mailbox is out of format
delMessage: Are you sure you want to delete it?
name: name
hostNameMessage: The host name cannot be empty
userDetail: The user logs in to the LDAP., such as: cn= user, dc= domain, and dc= name
nameDetail: Server hostname for running LDAP. For example: ldap.example.com
basicDnMessage: The basic DN cannot be empty
userDnMessage: Additional user DN cannot be empty
groupDnMessage: Additional group DN cannot be empty
synchBreakMessage: The synchronization interval (seconds) cannot be empty
synchBreakDetail: The time interval for directory updates, in seconds.default 30m
ReadTimeouDetailt: The timeout time to read the data, in seconds.default 10s
searchTimeoutDetail: The time to wait for the search response, in seconds.default 10s
connTimeoutDetail: The timeout time to connect to the directory, in seconds.default 10s
objectClassMessage: The user object class cannot be empty
objectFilterMessage: The user object filter cannot be empty
objectClassDetail: The LDAP user object class that is used when the user is loaded,defaults to'inetOrgPerson'
attributeDetail: Property field used when the user account is loaded, defaults to'cn'
basicDnDetail: Search users and groups from the LDAP root node. For example: cn=users,dc=exmaple,dc=com .
userDnDetail: When searching for users, the search limits are based on the underlying DN.default'ou=users'
groupDnDetail: When searching for groups, returns are limited based on the underlying DN search.default'ou=groups'
groupObjectMessage: The group object class cannot be empty
groupFilterMessage: Group object filter cannot be empty
groupAttributeMessage: Group name properties cannot be empty
groupDescMessage: The group description property cannot be empty
groupObjectDetail: When the group is loaded, the LDAP property 'object class' is used
groupFilterDetail: Filter used to search for group objects
groupAttributeDetail: Property fields used when the group name is loaded,defaults to'cn'
groupDescDetail: This property field is used to load group descriptions. The current backend is not used
searchUser: When looking for user group identity members
groupMemberMessage: Group member properties cannot be empty
groupMemberDetail: Property fields that are used when loading members from a group,defaults to'member'
menberAttributeDetail: Property fields to use when loading a user group,defaults to'memberOf'
disableOperation: Disable this user directory for user authentication
synchOperation: Manual synchronization of user catalog information
enableOperation: Enable this user directory for user authentication
deleteOperation: Delete this directory, and all the information in that user directory will also be deleted
userMessage: The following table shows the directories configured in the system.
userMessageTwo: In addition to the local directory, you can configure synchronization rules. Background automatic synchronization. The same user, if the user's name / user name / mailbox already exists' local ', will not perform synchronization
syncNone: Not yet synchronized, please synchronize first
delAllMessage: Are you sure you want to delete these data in bulk?
NullNotice: Please select the data you want to delete
clearMessage: Are you sure you want to clean up?
auditMessageTwo: The enabling rule will be that the system records the user's action traces and cleans up the historical data at 04:00 per day by cleaning up the rules. When the number of days is'0', the data is not actively cleaned up.
auditMessage: Auditing rules are a mechanism for controlling the system to record user level operations.
delTitle: Please confirm again, delete or not?
delContent: Deleting the tenant affects all data filtering rules that affect the associated roles. This operation is irreversible. Please consider it carefully
tenantHomeMessage: Home tenant: the tenant used to specify the current role Association. All data created by the user under this role will belong to the tenant
tenantLinkMessage: Link tenant: the data used to specify which tenants the current role can view
warnTips: A tenant is a mechanism for controlling data isolation between roles. Changing the tenant will affect the data of the role. Please choose carefully!!
warnDetail: Warning! Changing the tenant will affect the data of the role. Please choose carefully!!
relationTitle: Are you sure you want to connect tenants?
disableConfirm: Are you sure you want to disable ${username}?
enableConfirm: Are you sure you want to enable ${username}?
CE_num: Special characters, Chinese and spaces cannot be entered
E_num: Special characters and spaces cannot be entered
loginRoleMessage: Welcome to long bright platform assistant management system
pwdMessageOverdue: The reset password link has expired
returnForgetPage: Click here to reset the password
finishPwd: Reset password successfully, click jump to login page
deleteSystemUserTips: Are you sure you need to delete the system user?

sshPasswdMsg: The SSH password cannot be empty

sshPrivKeyPathMsg: The private key path cannot be empty

sshPublicKeyMsg: The public key content cannot be empty

sshKeyPassMsg: The certificate password cannot be empty
homePathMsg: The home path cannot be empty
deleteSSHNotice: Are you sure you want to delete the SSH user?

syserr: User connection configuration information is incomplete
secDelsshNotice: Deleting the user can not physically remove the user on the host, but just delete the database record. This operation is not reversible. Please operate carefully
senderr: The SSH password and the private key path cannot be empty at the same time
sendTitle: Synchronize the user to the host
apiNumTip: You can add only three APIKEY at most
apiTitle: We can call the back end interface in API mode to increase the scalability of the program!
apiOneContent: 1. Max each user can only add 3 API KEY
apiTwoContent: 2. the permissions passed by API KEY are the same as the user's own permissions
certificateFileError: The file extension can only be .cer.
importCertificateTips: Click the file to import or drag and drop file import, only supports the suffix name. Cer format.
loginErrorTips: The verification center has a failure and can not log in!
